>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/votes/auto-proposal"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Automatically create a proposal if the message warrants Pentarchy voting.

This is called by the chat system when an action is detected that requires governance.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Request body for auto-proposal endpoint.","properties":{"conversation_id":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Conversation Id"},"message":{"title":"Message","type":"string"}},"required":["message"],"title":"AutoProposalRequest","type":"object"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
